name: line-highlighter
description: Lose track of how far you've read on a web page? Line Highlighter is a simple, privacy focused extension that highlights your current position on any website
author: Kyle Chadha

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && VERSION=$(grep '"version"' manifest.json | sed 's/.*"version": "\(.*\)".*/\1/') && zip -r build/line-highlighter-v${VERSION}.zip manifest.json src/ assets/ -x '*.DS_Store' && echo "Built: build/line-highlighter-v${VERSION}.zip"
